info.name: CT Scan - Measurement of CTDI APIs
info.description: APIs for creating, fetching, and updating Measurement of CTDI test data for CT Scan machines.

item.name: 3️⃣ Update Measurement of CTDI by Test ID

request.description: Updates Measurement of CTDI test record by testId.
